data: In the confusion of thought about a future life, the peculiar facts related in the following pages can certainly be regarded as helpful.

The Certainty of a Future Life in Mars
Being the Posthumous Papers of Bradford Torrey Dodd
Gratacap, L. P. (Louis Pope), 1851-1917; Schiaparelli, G. V. (Giovanni Virginio), 1835-1910 [Contributor]
